title: How to Do an Inside Out Ponytail

steps.title: Gather the hair into a ponytail.
steps.content: Gather the hair into a ponytail. Use your hands and a brush to make sure that your ponytail is even and neat. You can decide how high or low you would like the ponytail to be. This style is usually started with a pony that is near the nape of your neck. [1] X Expert Source Sarah Kosakowski Professional Hair Stylist Expert Interview. 3 September 2021.

steps.title: Fasten the ponytail with a covered elastic band.
steps.content: Fasten the ponytail with a covered elastic band. Adjust the ponytail as needed to make it lower or higher depending on how you want your style to look. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use your fingers to make a hole right above the hair band.
steps.content: Use your fingers to make a hole right above the hair band. Make the hole in the center of the back of your head. [3] X Research source Try to get the hole as close to the elastic band as possible. [4] X Expert Source Sarah Kosakowski Professional Hair Stylist Expert Interview. 3 September 2021.

steps.title: Pull the ponytail down through the hole.
steps.content: Pull the ponytail down through the hole. With one hand, keep the hair separated and with the other hand pull the ponytail end through the hole you have created. [5] X Expert Source Sarah Kosakowski Professional Hair Stylist Expert Interview. 3 September 2021. Tuck the end of your ponytail down through the hole.

steps.title: Adjust the ponytail as needed.
steps.content: Adjust the ponytail as needed. You may need to tighten the ponytail a little bit to make it look how you want. Use your fingers to divide the ponytail hair and tug on both sides at the same time. [6] X Expert Source Sarah Kosakowski Professional Hair Stylist Expert Interview. 3 September 2021.

steps.title: Complete your style as desired.
steps.content: Complete your style as desired. Add a bit of hair spray to hold your style in place or add some decorative touches. You can wear your inside out ponytail as it is or add a headband, some barrettes, or a ribbon.

steps.title: Gather the hair into a high ponytail.
steps.content: Gather the hair into a high ponytail. Use your hands and a brush to make sure that your ponytail is even and neat. You can decide how high or low you would like the ponytail to be.

steps.title: Fasten the ponytail with a covered elastic band.
steps.content: Fasten the ponytail with a covered elastic band. Adjust the ponytail as needed to make it lower or higher, but keep it high and towards the back of your head. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Use your fingers to make a hole right above the hair band.
steps.content: Use your fingers to make a hole right above the hair band. Make the hole in the center of the back of your head. Try to get the hole as close to the elastic band as possible. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Pull the ponytail about halfway through the hole.
steps.content: Pull the ponytail about halfway through the hole. With one hand, keep the hair separated and with the other hand pull the ponytail end through the hole you have created. Tuck the end of your ponytail down through the hole. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Wrap the end of your ponytail around the base of your ponytail.
steps.content: Wrap the end of your ponytail around the base of your ponytail. Secure the end of your ponytail to the base of your ponytail with some bobby pins. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Adjust your bun as needed.
steps.content: Adjust your bun as needed. You may need to tighten the ponytail a little bit and adjust the bun a bit to make it look how you want. Use your fingers to divide the ponytail hair and tug on both sides at the same time. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Complete your style as desired.
steps.content: Complete your style as desired. Add a bit of hair spray to hold your style in place or add some decorative touches. You can wear your inside out ponytail bun as it is or add a headband, some barrettes, or a ribbon.
